title: 求助，纯1.4.7装了Forge稳定版，ReiMinimap,更多血量塞尔达传说mod后运行一段时间就崩
author: kakiyuhaku
txt_content:
如题，具体的mod版本是Forge 6.6.0.497稳定版 for Minecraft 1.4.7，[1.4.6]ReiMinimap_v3.2_06_CN(sy)，更多血量-塞尔达传说mod，然后运行一段时间后（几个小时不等），风扇声音较响后就画面卡主，然后就自动弹出崩溃的信息，或者一直卡住然后我用任务管理器强行关闭，但是还能再次打开，存档也是接着卡住的地方。
但是这次卡住后，我强关，然后打开看见mojang后就一直崩溃，连主界面都进不去，显示的崩溃信息如下：
之前纯1.4.7的时候一直没问题的。
Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Unexpected error

A full error report has been saved to D:\下载软件\MCLauncherDX(默认皮肤)\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-02-01_23.56.57-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(



--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT c0b51ab --------
Full report at:
D:\下载软件\MCLauncherDX(默认皮肤)\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-02-01_23.56.57-client.txt
Please show that file to Mojang, NOT just this screen!

Generated 13-2-1 下午11:56

-- System Details --
Details:
        Minecraft Version: 1.4.7
        Operating System: Windows 7 (amd64) version 6.1
        Java Version: 1.7.0_11, Oracle Corporation
        Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
        Memory: 468300752 bytes (446 MB) / 648740864 bytes (618 MB) up to 1908932608 bytes (1820 MB)
        JVM Flags: 2 total; -Xms512M -Xmx2048M
        AABB Pool Size: 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) allocated, 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) used
        Suspicious classes: FML and Forge are installed
        IntCache: cache: 0, tcache: 0, allocated: 0, tallocated: 0
        FML: MCP v7.26 FML v4.7.4.520 Minecraft Forge 6.6.0.497 5 mods loaded, 5 mods active
        mcp [Minecraft Coder Pack] (minecraft.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available
        FML [Forge Mod Loader] (coremods) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available
        Forge [Minecraft Forge] (coremods) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available
        mod_ReiMinimap [mod_ReiMinimap] (minecraft.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available
        nohero_moreHealth [More Health Forge] (minecraft.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available
        LWJGL: 2.8.4
        OpenGL: ~~ERROR~~ NullPointerException: null
        Is Modded: Definitely; Client brand changed to 'forge,fml'
        Type: Client (map_client.txt)
        Texture Pack: Default
        Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)
        Vec3 Pool Size: ~~ERROR~~ NullPointerException: null[failed to get system properties (java.lang.NullPointerException)]


java.lang.NullPointerException
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.GL11.glGetError(GL11.java:1278)

replies.author: yorlereiyo
replies.txt_content:
at org.lwjgl.opengl.GL11.glGetError(GL11.java:1278)
请升级最新的显卡驱动

replies.author: kakiyuhaku
replies.txt_content:
yorlereiyo 发表于 2013-2-2 00:27 
at org.lwjgl.opengl.GL11.glGetError(GL11.java:1278)
请升级最新的显卡驱动
我显卡是AMD的，你是说我要升级AMD的驱动？
可我现在用的就是为了玩minecraft，7天前才升级的最新beta版驱动，升级好后一只能玩的，今天装了mod才出的问题

replies.author: 大兴
replies.txt_content:
xeji 发表于 2013-2-2 10:11 
水桶还是官服？
人家这是客户端好么。。。
